title: News24.com | WATCH | Cape Town child protection unit detectives test for Covid-19 after colleague tests positive
description: Detectives from the Family Violence, Child Protection and Sexual Offences Unit in Bellville, Cape Town, have all been tested for Covid-19 after a member of the specialised squad was hospitalised with the virus.
content: Detectives from the Family Violence, Child Protection and Sexual Offences Unit in Bellville, Cape Town, rushed to get tested for Covid-19 on Wednesday. This after members of the specialised squad discovered one of their colleagues had been hospitalised with t… [+1280 chars]
